attributes.action: Block any requests for referendum rule changes/2nd referendums being triggered.
attributes.additional_details:
The voters choice of the EU referendum held on 23rd June 2016 should be the final results and remain unchanged.

Any change to the 23rd June results would be illegal interference with the process.
attributes.background: We the undersigned call for a block on a change to EU referendum rules or a second referendum being held in England and Wales.
